m_szDocTitle: Some new developments we may have missed this week | ZDNet
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Some new developments we may have missed this week Electrics: where do you plug in?  Our energy future and update on East Anglia hacking. Remember the hacking of the computers at the University of East Anglia's climate research unit ? Now the UK's top 'domestic extremism team" is working with the local constabulary in trying to track down the hackers. WHERE'S OUR ENERGY FUTURE IN THE U.S.?
